uk.ac.ebi.ep.sitemap
Class SiteMapImpl

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.ep.sitemap.SiteMapResources<File>
      uk.ac.ebi.ep.sitemap.SiteMapImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISiteMap<File>
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class SiteMapImpl
extends SiteMapResources<File>

This class is the implementation of the ISiteMap. it uses the Resources from the super class to retrieve relevant data from the database to generate a siteMap. ** THIS CLASS IS DEPRECATED**

Author:
joseph
